welcome.title: Welcome to the GraphiQL App
welcome.subtitle: Good to see you here
welcome.graphiQL: GraphiQL is a playground/IDE for graphQL requests.
welcome.rsschool: RS School is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community since 2013.
welcome.course: React course covers fundamentals, real-world applications, popular libraries and tools, preparing students for real React projects.
welcome.Rodion-description: Rodion was involved in integrating auth, error boundary,a spinner, and deployment, tests. Overall, he was an excellent team leader.
welcome.Maria-description: Maria was responsible for localization, layout design of pages, and responsiveness. She configured the header and footer as well.
welcome.Anna-description: Anna was in charge of integrate documentation and displaying the output of the editor's editing. She also integrated CodeMirror.

validation.password: Min 8 symbols, one letter, one digit, one special character!
